item.title: iOS Adventure Games
item.description: I spend a lot of time travelling for business which means I have a lot of time to kill. One of my favourite past times is playing adventure games and my iPad has been a godsend. Here are brief reviews of some of the games I’ve played during the long flights. ❤️ “Kathy Rain” A thoroughly enjoyable adventure with a decent story + voice acting and nice art. I completed this over the course of a couple of flights and while there were plenty of challenging puzzles I never got completelystuck or frustrated, which is quite rare.
